Title: How to Set Realistic Expectations For Your Business
Description:
Today we’ll hear about:

•       A woman who’s hesitant to take over the family business because of how her dad has managed the business finances

•       How to help your business when you have heavy turnover

•       A new business owner who needs to know the top skills he should focus on to succeed

•       What to do when team members think your success and wealth came from blind luck
